## Diamonds Dataset Plotly

```{r include=FALSE}
library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r, messages = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
data(diamonds)
plot_ly(data = diamonds, x = ~carat, y = ~price, type = "scatter", mode = "markers", color = ~cut)
```
